publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1053 Brian Adam: Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover—That the Parliament notes the impact that local authority reviews of the European Working Time Directive have had on the provision of night-time warden services in sheltered housing complexes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consider the problem urgently.
S1M-1053 Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover (lodged on 26 June 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1053 Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover (lodged on 26 June 2000) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1053 Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover (lodged on 26 June 2000) Shona Robison*

S1M-1053 Brian Adam: Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover—That the Parliament notes the impact that local authority reviews of the European Working Time Directive have had on the provision of night-time warden services in sheltered housing complexes and calls upon the Scottish Executive to consider the problem urgently. Supported by: Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Shona Robison
S1M-1053 Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover (lodged on 26 June 2000) Christine Grahame*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Fiona McLeod*, Michael Russell*, Irene McGugan*, Andrew Wilson*, Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-1053 Sheltered Housing Wardens Night-Time Cover (lodged on 26 June 2000) Ms Sandra White*
